title: Effects Euro expansion on trade and relations 17th

content.question: Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work.Describe and analyze how overseas expansion by European states affected global trade and international relations from 1600 to 1715.
